comment: So much for somber and solemn . House Dems are so excited about impeachment that they re passing out commemorative pens and grinning for photos at a celebration ceremony . Unbelievable . <URL>

# ::snt So much for somber and solemn . House Dems are so excited about impeachment that they re passing out commemorative pens and grinning for photos at a celebration ceremony . Unbelievable . <URL>

                  :op1 (s2 / somber)
                  :op2 (s3 / solemn)))
      :snt2 (e / excite-01
            :ARG0 (ii / impeach-01)
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (p2 / political-party
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Democrat"))
                        :ARG2 (m3 / member)
                        :ARG0 p)
                  :ARG1 (g / government-organization
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "House"))))
      :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
            :ARG1 p
            :ARG3 (s4 / so)
            :ARG6 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p3 / pass-out-11

                        :ARG1 (p4 / pen
                              :ARG2-of (c / commemorate-01)))
                  :op2 (g2 / grin-01

                              :ARG0 p)
                        :time (c2 / ceremony
                              :mod (c3 / celebrate-01)))))
      :snt3 (p6 / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (b / believe-01)))
